General_Description: '''Cursed Gold''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "Making [[Sparta]]ns hungry would also weaken their attacks."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra looted the Spartan [[Treasure chest|National Treasures]] all over Greece, gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Chests of Glory]] and [[Poor Don't Fight]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
